column4: I'd love to, if I knew how...maybe someone on #windows can figure out how to at least get Windows to recognize the correct file size...
could be...though the one Wubi created uses the full 5 GB I gave it
but now I want to see if any of my games work and how hard it is to get them to do so, and I need more space
You should probably try asking in the wubi forums (I don't believe they have an IRC channel): http://ubuntuforums.org/forumdisplay.php?f=234
